title: 服务器启动出现问题
author: 响亮的W666
txt_content:
服务器启动后最后出现这个The state engine was in incorrect state ERRORED and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.
                                          The state engine was in incorrect state ERRORED and forced into state AVAILABLE. Errors may have been discarded.
怎么办啊？
